weloveclouds.server.services

Class MovableDataAccessService

  • java.lang.Object
    • weloveclouds.server.services.DataAccessService
      • weloveclouds.server.services.MovableDataAccessService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataAccessService, IMovableDataAccessService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReplicableDataAccessService

    public class MovableDataAccessService
extends DataAccessService
implements IMovableDataAccessService
    An implementation of IMovableDataAccessService whose underlying storage units can be moved.

        public PutType putEntry(weloveclouds.commons.kvstore.models.KVEntry entry)
                 throws StorageException
        Description copied from interface: IDataAccessService
        Insert or update a key-value pair in the storage.
        Specified by:
        putEntry in interface IDataAccessService
        Overrides:
        putEntry in class DataAccessService
        Parameters:
        entry - that contains the key and the value
        Returns:
        PutType.INSERT} if key was stored for the first time in the storage, or a PutType.UPDATE if the key was already stored
        Throws:
        StorageException - if any error occurs

                           boolean coordinatorRoleIsExpected)
                    throws StorageException
        Puts the respective entry into the storage
        Parameters:
        entry - that has to be put in the storage
